attributes.action: Declare the EU referendum void due to the lies told by the leave campaign.
attributes.background:
I believe the British people have been mislead by the EU leave campaign and as such should declare the EU referendum void.

The British government should ensure that its people are in receipt of the full facts before any move to Brexit is made.

rejection.details: Apologies, the link we previously sent was incorrect. We cannot accept the petition that you submitted as it is very similar to the following petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/139789
